description: This file contains utility functions for DHCP client configuration using udhcpc, including constructing request and send options, starting and stopping udhcpc process.

methods.name: int udhcpc_get_req_options(char * buff,size_t buff_size,dhcp_opt_list * req_opt_list)
methods.description: Constructs a buffer with DHCP REQUEST options for udhcpc based on a list of options.

methods.name: int udhcpc_get_send_options(char * buff,size_t buff_size,dhcp_opt_list * send_opt_list)
methods.description: Builds a buffer with DHCP SEND options for udhcpc based on a list of options.

methods.name: int udhcpc_get_other_args(char * buff,size_t buff_size,dhcp_params * params)
methods.description: Creates a buffer with other udhcpc command line arguments such as interface, pidfile, and script.

methods.name: pid_t start_udhcpc(dhcp_params * params,dhcp_opt_list * req_opt_list,dhcp_opt_list * send_opt_list)
methods.description: Prepares command-line options and launches the udhcpc client process for a specified interface.

methods.name: int stop_udhcpc(dhcp_params * params)
methods.description: Stops a running udhcpc process associated with a specific interface.

ctags.name: start_udhcpc
ctags.pattern: /^pid_t start_udhcpc (dhcp_params * params, dhcp_opt_list * req_opt_list, dhcp_opt_list * send_opt/

ctags.name: udhcpc_get_other_args
ctags.pattern: /^static int udhcpc_get_other_args (char * buff, size_t buff_size, dhcp_params * params)$/

ctags.name: udhcpc_get_req_options
ctags.pattern: /^static int udhcpc_get_req_options (char * buff, size_t buff_size, dhcp_opt_list * req_opt_list)$/

ctags.name: udhcpc_get_send_options
ctags.pattern: /^static int udhcpc_get_send_options (char * buff, size_t buff_size, dhcp_opt_list * send_opt_list/
